sentences.en: But they agreed that going to the highest level could be an eventuality.
sentences.cn: 但他们一致认同,最终很可能会达到那个级别.

sentences.en: Every eventuality is covered, from running out of petrol to needing water.
sentences.cn: 从汽油耗尽到用水紧缺，所有可能发生的事情都考虑到了。

sentences.en: He equips with arms with the axe being ready for any eventuality.
sentences.cn: 他用斧子武装起来以防万一.

sentences.en: However, line capacity must be large, better heat dissipation in order to prevent any eventuality.
sentences.cn: 但线路容量一定要大, 散热要好,以防不测.

sentences.en: It was just an eventuality for me, you know?
sentences.cn: 对我来说这只是种可能发生的事, 你知道?

sentences.en: More important, they are able to accept the eventuality of reunification.
sentences.cn: 最重要的是, 他们都能接受将来两岸终究要统一的现实.
绝不可能出现那种情况.

sentences.en: Talking all things together, one would say that this is the most likely eventuality.
sentences.cn: 把这些总在一起看, 可以说这是最可能发生之事.
那是不大可能发生的事情。

sentences.en: We have to be ready for any eventuality.
sentences.cn: 我们必须准备好以防万一的后果.

sentences.en: We must be prepared for any eventuality.
sentences.cn: 我们必须有所准备以防万一.
我们什麽事情都要考虑到.

sentences.en: We were prepared for every eventuality .
sentences.cn: 我们准备应付任何可能出现的情况。

sentences.en: When the transfer market opens, I cannot exclude any eventuality.
sentences.cn: 但是当转会市场的大门开启后, 我不能排除一切的可能.

sentences.en: Whether the peace negotiations are overall or local, we should be prepared for such an eventuality.
sentences.cn: 不论是全面的和平谈判,或者局部的和平谈判, 我们都应当这样去准备.

words.tran_cn: 最后的，结果的；可能的；终于的
可能性；可能发生的事；不测的事

trans.tran_en: something that might happen, especially something bad
